name: @sldm/monorepo
description: Modern full-stack TypeScript framework built from the ground up

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @sldm/utils build && pnpm --filter @sldm/testing build && pnpm --filter @sldm/core build && pnpm --filter @sldm/debug build && pnpm --filter @sldm/web-ai build && pnpm --filter @sldm/ui build && pnpm --filter @sldm/ui-chalk build && pnpm --filter @sldm/router build && pnpm --filter @sldm/store build && pnpm --filter @sldm/context build && pnpm --filter @sldm/ssr build && pnpm --filter @sldm/storage build && pnpm --filter @sldm/integrations build && pnpm --filter @sldm/dev-reports build
scripts.ci:test: pnpm build && pnpm test:ci && pnpm typecheck:ci && pnpm format:check
scripts.ci:local: pnpm ci:test && echo 'âœ… All CI checks passed locally!'
scripts.publish:all: pnpm build && pnpm test && pnpm publish:prepare && pnpm publish:packages
